name: edges block from moving
content:
The edges of the display block the sprite from moving.

The edges of the display can be used as a barrier to contain sprites. Whenever a sprite touches one of the four edges of the display, it will stop moving.

examples.description: The sprite can move anywhere in the display, but it cannot go beyond the edges.

palette_params.name: sprite
palette_params.description: The sprite or sprite group blocked by the edges

short_description: The edges of the display block the sprite from moving.
